title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2002.7 - Agreement execution
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2002.7 - Agreement execution

State Regulations

Upon a resolution of approval to enter into such agreement by
the directors of the corporation, and a favorable determination by the State

Director of the Budget of the elements set forth in section
2002.4
of this Part, the
appropriate representative of the municipality and the executive director of
the corporation may execute the agreement. No services shall be rendered by the
corporation until the agreement has been duly executed by the municipality and
the corporation. The corporation shall file with the State Director of the

Budget a copy of the executed agreement and all amendments
thereto. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2002.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
